rooms.description: Large entrance with eco-friendly materials and natural light.
Spacious living area integrating indoor plants and sustainable design elements.
Energy-efficient kitchen with eco-friendly fixtures and ample natural light.
Compact, well-ventilated bathroom with Vastu principles in mind for positive energy flow.
Quiet study space with ample shelving and natural light, positioned as per Vastu for knowledge.

openings.description: Eco-friendly door with proper ventilation and natural lighting aligned with Vastu norms.
Energy-efficient windows ensuring optimum natural light and air circulation.
Access to the garden from the living room for enhanced air quality.

garden_access.location: Adjacent to the Living Room and Balcony
garden_access.description: Large eco-friendly garden with native plants and a water recycling system in compliance with Vastu.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom ensuring privacy and calm energy flow with Vastu alignment.
Dedicated entertainment space integrated into the duplex design for optimal acoustics and natural light control.
Well-placed bathroom with proper ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Eco-friendly staircase connecting both floors, designed for energy efficiency and structural integrity.
Window offering a view of the garden and facilitating natural ventilation.

eco_features: Use of sustainable materials like bamboo flooring and recycled bricks.
Installation of solar panels for energy efficiency.
Rainwater harvesting system integrated with garden irrigation.
Energy-efficient lighting and insulation to reduce carbon footprint.

directions: Main entrance should face north or east according to Vastu guidelines.
Living room placed in the south-west for positive energy flow.
Kitchen oriented east for good health and prosperity.
Library positioned in the north-east corner for knowledge enhancement.
vastu_compliance.note: All openings and room placements have been designed following traditional Vastu Shastra principles to ensure a harmonious living environment.
